text.text_translated: The Hunger Games is a hugely successful book for teenagers and young adults by the American author Suzanne Collins, which has sold millions of copies around the world and been translated into 26 different languages since it was published in 2008. It is also the first book for young readers that has sold more than a million electronic copies. The Hunger Games has now been made into a major Hollywood film that is just as successful, making 152.5 million dollars in North America alone during its opening weekend.
